title: Red Hat Arms Developers With AI-Powered Migration Tools
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: Red Hat unveils Konveyor AI and Developer Hub 1.5, bringing AI-powered modernization and enhanced developer experience to enterprise software development.
cntitle: 红帽利用 AI 驱动的迁移工具武装开发者
cndescription: 红帽推出 Konveyor AI 和 Developer Hub 1.5，为企业软件开发带来 AI 驱动的现代化和增强的开发者体验。
